trans-unit.source: Windshield washer fluid is required to keep your windshield wipers functioning properly.

seg-source.mrk: Windshield washer fluid is required to keep your windshield wipers functioning properly.

target.mrk: Windshield washer fluid is required to keep your windshield wipers functioning properly.

trans-unit.source: Keep your car's windshield washer fluid topped up so you will have a clean windshield whatever the weather or insect population.

seg-source.mrk: Keep your car's windshield washer fluid topped up so you will have a clean windshield whatever the weather or insect population.

target.mrk: Keep your car's windshield washer fluid topped up so you will have a clean windshield whatever the weather or insect population.
